__e: I've been reading and re-reading Isaac's letters, and I've decided to tell him I want to meet.
- I've traced Isaac and his daughter.

But my covenant will I establish with Isaac which Sarah shall bear unto thee."

"Say to the Israelites: The Lord, the God of your fathers, the God of Abraham, the God of Isaac, the God of Jacob, has sent me to you. This is my name forever; this is the title with which I will be remembered from generation to generation " [ cf. Is. 3,15].
Isaac my son, just today I said to Abraham, why hasn't Isaac come?
